name: HAL Gamecase
overview: Compilation of HAL Laboratory games: Balance, Butamaru Pants, Dragon Attack, Dunk Shot, Eggerland Mystery, Fruit Search, Heavy Boxing, Hole in One, Hole in One Profesional, Bull and Mighty's Slim Chance, Space Maze Attack, Mr. Chin, Picture Puzzle, Roller Ball, Super Snake, The Roving Planet Styllus and Space Trouble
